sircovid 0.9.23

Remap state to include vaccination

Source: R/vaccination.R
vaccination_remap_state.Rd

Remap state that was run with one stratum to support vaccination. This is useful where fitting was done pre-vaccination and the model state needs to be expanded to support vaccination for simulations.

vaccination_remap_state(state_orig, info_orig, info_vacc)

Arguments

state_orig

An original state matrix (rows representing state, columns representing particles or samples). This must be the complete model state.
info_orig

The results of info() from the model object without vaccination
info_vacc

The results of info() from the model object with vaccination

Value

A 3d array with more rows than state.

Contents

Developed by Marc Baguelin, Edward Knock, Lilith Whittles, Rich FitzJohn, John Lees, Anne Cori.
